bibl.title: Three new fragments from the J. Rendel Harris Collection (Birmingham)
bibl.seg: Lincoln H. Blumell & Michael R. Trotter, Three New Fragments from the J. Rendel Harris Collection (Birmingham).

1. Inv. 300. LXX Psalms 1,6 - 2,1. Provenance ?, fourth century A.D. - 2. Inv. 489b. A New Order from the Philantinoos Archive. Oxyrhynchite Nome, late third / early fourth century A.D. - 3. Inv. 269.3. Copy of a Receipt from a Roll or Daybook. Oxyrhynchus, late first / second century A.D.
bibl.note: 1. Inv. 300. LXX Psalms 1,6 - 2,1. Provenance ?, fourth century A.D. - 2. Inv. 489b. A New Order from the Philantinoos Archive. Oxyrhynchite Nome, late third / early fourth century A.D. - 3. Inv. 269.3. Copy of a Receipt from a Roll or Daybook. Oxyrhynchus, late first / second century A.D.
